info.name: Facebook: Chat bar at the left
info.description:
*troll face* All in the title :P Is there a moron who don't understand ? Work with Social Reviver addon (old chat tool)

http://www.socialreviver.net/

Notice that I usually use/test this style with my facebook style: http://userstyles.org/styles/68198/facebook-zatsune-miku-edit-by-full-interest
